com.digby.localpoint.sdk.core

Interface ILPLocalpointService


  • public interface ILPLocalpointService
    A Localpoint service is the entry point for applications to Localpoint functionality.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    2.6.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ILPDevice getDevice()
      Returns the device associated with the Localpoint service.
      ILPLocalNotificationProvider getLocalNotificationProvider()
      Returns the local notification provider associated with the Localpoint service.
      ILPLocationProvider getLocationProvider()
      Returns the location provider associated with the Localpoint service.
      ILPMessageProvider getMessageProvider()
      Returns the message provider associated with the Localpoint service.
      ILPVersion getSDKVersion()
      Returns the version for the Localpoint SDK.
      ILPUser getUser()
      Returns the user of the Localpoint service.
      boolean isBrandEnabled()
      Indicates whether the brand identifier used by this service is enabled.
      void start()
      Starts this service.
      void stop()
      Stops the Localpoint service.

    • Method Detail

      • getDevice

        ILPDevice getDevice()
        Returns the device associated with the Localpoint service.

        This method should never return null.

        Returns:
        the device associated with the Localpoint service

      • getUser

        ILPUser getUser()
        Returns the user of the Localpoint service.

        This method should never return null.

        Returns:
        the user of the Localpoint service

      • getLocationProvider

        ILPLocationProvider getLocationProvider()
        Returns the location provider associated with the Localpoint service.

        This method should never return null.

        Returns:
        the location provider associated with the Localpoint service

      • getMessageProvider

        ILPMessageProvider getMessageProvider()
        Returns the message provider associated with the Localpoint service.

        This method should never return null.

        Returns:
        the message provider associated with the Localpoint service

      • getSDKVersion

        ILPVersion getSDKVersion()
        Returns the version for the Localpoint SDK.

        This method should never return null.

        Returns:
        the version for the Localpoint SDK

      • isBrandEnabled

        boolean isBrandEnabled()
        Indicates whether the brand identifier used by this service is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if the brand identifier is enabled; false otherwise

      • start

        void start()
        Starts this service.

        Turns on the SDK and puts it into a ready state to begin device registration and start location services. This call has no effect if this service has previously been started.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops the Localpoint service.

        Turns off the SDK and stops location services. This call has no effect if this service has previously been stopped.

      • getLocalNotificationProvider

        ILPLocalNotificationProvider getLocalNotificationProvider()
        Returns the local notification provider associated with the Localpoint service.

        This method should never return null.

        Returns:
        the local notification provider associated with the Localpoint service
